definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: We can play the explanations manually or automatically.

definition: someone who attaches great importance to good looks (esp. in others)
(female usage) older brother (loanword from Korean "oppa")/male friend
manipulation (e.g. ball handling in sport)/hand job
to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia
(neologism c. 2009) don't worry, it's all taken care of
airline steward (abbr. for 空中少爺|空中少爷[kong1 zhong1 shao4 ye5])
lolicon or rorikon (Japanese loanword)/manga or anime genre depicting young girls in an erotic manner
outsourcing/people who judge others by their looks (abbr. for 外貌協會|外貌协会[wai4 mao4 xie2 hui4])
